word:
How can the professed people of God be content to be at variance with one another? Surely they see in the world enough of the sad result 


                                     -274- 

of alienation and strife. Satan strives to bring disunion into the ranks of God's followers, that Christ's heart may be pained. Let those who are serving the Lord make sure that their service is not a pretence. This is what it is when they talk against one another, giving way to a spirit of envy and fault-finding.
